quote: My dears, laugh at me if you like; it is not conventionally beautiful, but there is something in its quaint old face which pleases me. If it could play the piano, I am sure it would really play.
quote_letters: MY DEARS LAUGH AT ME IF YOU LIKE IT IS NOT CONVENTIONALLY BEAUTIFUL BUT THERE IS SOMETHING IN ITS QUAINT OLD FACE WHICH PLEASES ME IF IT COULD PLAY THE PIANO I AM SURE IT WOULD REALLY PLAY
